name: ssd
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: A sufficient condition for a subclass relationship. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
